text: malinarannu nirmalarinda pratyekisuva tanaka allahanu visvasigalannu â€“ indu nivu iruvantaha sthitiyalle bittu bidalaranu. Allahanu ella gupta visayagalannu nimage tilisi biduvudilla. (Adakkagi) allahanu tanna dutara paiki tanicchisuvavarannu aydukolluttane. Nivu allahanalli mattavana dutaralli visvasavidiri. I riti nivu visvasavittu, satya nistheya margavannu anusarisidare nimage bhavya pratiphala sigalide
